description: Export the current document as a JPEG image file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as JPEG. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: JPEG quality from 0 (lowest) to 12 (highest). Default is 8.
Embed ICC color profile in the file. Default is true.
Save as progressive JPEG for web display. Default is false.

description: Export the current document as a PNG image file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as PNG. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: PNG compression level from 0 (none) to 9 (maximum). Default is 6.
Save as interlaced PNG for progressive display. Default is false.
Preserve transparency in the exported file. Default is true.

description: Export the current document as a GIF image file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as GIF. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Number of colors in palette from 2 to 256. Default is 256.
Dithering method. Possible values: NONE, DIFFUSION, PATTERN, NOISE. Default is DIFFUSION.
Preserve transparency in the exported file. Default is false.
Save as interlaced GIF. Default is false.

description: Export the current document as a TIFF image file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as TIFF. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Compression method. Possible values: NONE, LZW, ZIP, JPEG. Default is NONE.
Embed ICC color profile in the file. Default is true.
Save layers in the TIFF file. Default is false.
Preserve transparency. Default is true.

description: Export the current document as a Photoshop PSD file with layers preserved.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as PSD. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Include a flattened composite for compatibility. Default is true.

description: Export the current document as a PDF file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as PDF. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: PDF quality preset. Possible values: SMALLEST_FILE, STANDARD, HIGH_QUALITY, PRESS_QUALITY. Default is STANDARD.
Preserve Photoshop editing capabilities. Default is true.
Embed ICC color profile. Default is true.
Include layers in the PDF. Default is false.

description: Export the current document as a WebP image file for web use.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as WebP. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: WebP quality from 0 to 100. Default is 80.
Use lossless compression. Default is false.
Preserve transparency. Default is true.

description: Export the current document as a BMP bitmap file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as BMP. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Bit depth. Possible values: BIT1, BIT4, BIT8, BIT16, BIT24, BIT32. Default is BIT24.
Use RLE compression for 4 and 8 bit depths. Default is false.

description: Export vector content and shapes as an SVG file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as SVG. Ensure a document is open and contains vector content.

params.paramDescription: Font embedding method. Possible values: NONE, GLYPHS_USED, ALL_GLYPHS. Default is GLYPHS_USED.
Embed raster images in the SVG. Default is true.

description: Export the current document as a HEIF/HEIC image file.

userMessage.error: Unable to export as HEIF. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: HEIF quality from 0 to 100. Default is 80.
Embed ICC color profile. Default is true.

description: Quickly export the document as PNG with default settings.

userMessage.success: Document quick exported as PNG successfully.
userMessage.error: Unable to quick export. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Quickly export the document as JPG with default settings.

userMessage.success: Document quick exported as JPG successfully.
userMessage.error: Unable to quick export. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Open the Export As dialog for custom export settings.

userMessage.success: Export As dialog is open. Choose format and settings, then click Export.
userMessage.error: Unable to open Export As dialog. Ensure a document is open.

description: Open the Save for Web dialog with optimized web export options.

userMessage.success: Save for Web dialog is open. Optimize settings and click Save.
userMessage.error: Unable to open Save for Web dialog. Ensure a document is open.

description: Export all layers as separate image files.

userMessage.success: All layers exported as separate files.
userMessage.error: Unable to export layers. Ensure a document with multiple layers is open.

params.paramDescription: Export format. Possible values: PNG, JPEG, PSD, TIFF, PDF. Default is PNG.
Include hidden layers in export. Default is false.
Trim transparent pixels around each layer. Default is true.

description: Export all artboards as separate image files.

userMessage.error: Unable to export artboards. Ensure a document with artboards is open.

params.paramDescription: Export format. Possible values: PNG, JPEG, PSD, PDF. Default is PNG.

description: Copy a merged version of visible layers to clipboard.

userMessage.error: Unable to copy merged. Ensure a document is open.

description: Enable automatic generation of image assets from layers with special naming.

userMessage.success: Image asset generation enabled. Rename layers with file extensions to auto-export.
userMessage.error: Unable to enable image asset generation.
